app description: Help the world gain more information about the corona virus. Fill a quick survey to see a distribution of how people are feeling.
about us description: We are a group of developers from Israel from Infinity Labs R&D. We have created this app as a contribution to the society during these challenging times. Our goal is to help people gain more information about the way the virus is spreading, and hopefully contribute to the ongoing battle.
if you have questions: If you have any questions about this project or if you just what to say hey ðŸ‘‹, you are more then welcome to send us an email!
survey intro: Please indicate to which degree you suffer from the following symptoms:
confirmed corona: Have you tested positive for COVID-19 (Coronavirus)?
submission failure: Sorry, it seems like you already submitted the survey in the last hour
404 message: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for
